sentences.sentence: So he bought beautiful dresses, pearls, and jewels for his two stepdaughters.
sentences.translation: 因此，他买了漂亮、珍珠、宝石为他的两个过继。

sentences.sentence: I have two kids, stepdaughters aged ten and sixteen, and I desperately want to send them out into the world with all the financial context that I lacked.
sentences.translation: 我有两个孩子，两个继女—一个十岁，一个十六岁。我特别想把她们带到外面的那个财务世界，因为我曾缺失过。
